title: pyBraille
description: Text image to Braille in Python 3, utilizing Microsoft Visual Recognition API. Placed 2nd place in the University of Alberta HackED 2018 Hackathon. Demonstrated the project via an Arduino which shows the Braille representation per letter.

title: Taxonomy Model SDK/UI
description: A npm package replicating the SDK used in data tracking. Events are transcribed by the developer based on actions and UI targets. Distributed via local storage and flushed out on capacity or timeout. Included is a complementary project displaying the usage of the SDK. A set amount of UI elements shown to demonstrate how the SDK works. All events are flushed in the console of the browser

title: Kijiji Monitor
description: Full-stack web scraping application to monitor multiple car listings in one screen. Save time by having all the vehicles you are interested in collected in one place to check on.
